    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException

        main method

        contains main menu loop with user choice variable that takes user input to select which action to do using a switch statement

        choice 1: add file path A

        choice 2: add file path B

        choice 3: Select shingle word size

        choice 4: Calculate jaccard index

        to calculate the jaccard index we create three threads 2 producer threads one for each document and 1 consumer thread these create a map of has values for documents A and B we find the size of the intersection of these two sets AnB and calculate the jaccard index using AnB / (a + b - Anb)
        Parameters:
        args -
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
